pages.title: Getting XP
pages.text: Press 'K' to open the skill screen.

pages.title: Skill Screen
pages.text: $(br)You gain levelz xp the same way as vanilla xp.$(br2)- kill mobs$(br)- smelt ores$(br)- trade$(br)- ...

pages.title: Categories
pages.text: Click on the icons to get in the respective categories

pages.title: Infos
pages.text: $(br)Here you will find infos about$(br2)$(li)item usage$(li)block usage$(li)armor equip$(li)extras$(br2)Some categories provide a button on the top right which leads to a sub page.

pages.title: Mining List
pages.text: In this sub category you see all locked blocks that are breakable if you skill in mining.

pages.title: Smithing List
pages.text: In this sub category you see all locked items that are smithable if you skill in smithing.

pages.title: Alchemy List
pages.text: In this sub category you see all locked brewing items that are usable if you skill in alchemy.

pages.title: Crafting List
pages.text: While in the main skill screen, click the crafting book on the upper right to open the crafting list.
